name: mapcomplete
description: A small website to edit OSM easily

#oauth_credentials:comment: `oauth_credentials` are the OAuth-2 credentials for the production-OSM server and the test-server.
Are you deploying your own instance? Register your application too.
Use `https://<your domain name>/<path to mapcomplete>/land.html` as redirect URIs. You can add `http://127.0.0.1:1234/land.html` too for local development.
Alternatively, you can override the `osm` credentials using the environment variables `VITE_OSM_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID` and `VITE_OSM_OAUTH_SECRET`

oauth_credentials.#: This client-id is registered by 'MapComplete' on OpenStreetMap.org

disabled:oauth_credentials.#: This client-id is registered by 'MapComplete' on https://master.apis.dev.openstreetmap.org/

config.#summary_server: Should be the endpoint; appending status.json should work

api_keys.#: Various API-keys for various services. Feel free to reuse those in another MapComplete-hosted version

scripts.init: npm ci && npm run prep:layeroverview && npm run generate && npm run download:editor-layer-index && npm run generate:layouts && npm run clean && npm run weblate:add-upstream
scripts.start: npm run generate:layeroverview && npm run strt
scripts.prepare-deploy: npm run generate:service-worker && ./scripts/prepare-build.sh && npm run build
scripts.test: export NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" && npm run clean:tests && (npm run generate:doctests 2>&1 | grep -v "No doctests found in") && npm run test:run-only && npm run clean:tests
scripts.generate:docs: rm -rf Docs/Themes/* && rm -rf Docs/Layers/* && rm -rf Docs/TagInfo && mkdir Docs/TagInfo && vite-node scripts/generateDocs.ts && vite-node scripts/generateTaginfoProjectFiles.ts
scripts.generate:service-worker: tsc src/service-worker.ts --outFile public/service-worker.js && git_hash=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && sed -i.bak "s/GITHUB-COMMIT/$git_hash/" public/service-worker.js && rm public/service-worker.js.bak
scripts.reset:layeroverview: npm run prep:layeroverview && npm run generate:layeroverview && npm run refresh:layeroverview
scripts.prep:layeroverview: mkdir -p ./src/assets/generated/layers; echo {\"themes\":[]} > ./src/assets/generated/known_themes.json && echo {\"layers\": []} > ./src/assets/generated/known_layers.json && rm -f ./src/assets/generated/layers/*.json && rm -f ./src/assets/generated/themes/*.json && cp ./assets/layers/usersettings/usersettings.json ./src/assets/generated/layers/usersettings.json && echo '{}' > ./src/assets/generated/layers/favourite.json && echo '{}' > ./src/assets/generated/layers/summary.json && echo '{}' > ./src/assets/generated/layers/last_click.json && echo '[]' > ./src/assets/generated/theme_overview.json
scripts.generate: npm run generate:licenses && npm run generate:images && npm run generate:charging-stations && npm run generate:translations && npm run refresh:layeroverview && npm run generate:service-worker
scripts.clean: rm -rf .cache/ && (find *.html | grep -v "^\(404\|index\|land\|privacy\|test\|studio\|theme\|style_test\|statistics\|status\|leaderboard\).html" | xargs -r rm) && (ls | grep "^index_[a-zA-Z_-]\+\.ts$" | xargs -r rm)
scripts.generate:dependency-graph: node_modules/.bin/depcruise --exclude "^node_modules" --output-type dot Logic/State/MapState.ts > dependencies.dot && dot dependencies.dot -T svg -o dependencies.svg && rm dependencies.dot
scripts.download:nsi-logos: vite-node scripts/downloadNsiLogos.ts || npm run downloadNsiLogos # This script crashes often without the possibility to correct - hence the auto retry with OR
scripts.weblate:add-upstream: git remote add weblate-github git@github.com:weblate/MapComplete.git && git remote add weblate-hosted-core https://hosted.weblate.org/git/mapcomplete/core/ && git remote add weblate-hosted-layers https://hosted.weblate.org/git/mapcomplete/layers/
scripts.weblate:merge: git remote update weblate-github; git merge weblate-github/weblate-mapcomplete-core weblate-github/weblate-mapcomplete-layers weblate-github/weblate-mapcomplete-layer-translations
scripts.weblate:merge-heavy: git fetch weblate-hosted-layers; git fetch weblate-hosted-core; git merge weblate-hosted-layers/master weblate-hosted-core/master
scripts.lint: npm run lint:prettier && npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:themes
scripts.optimize-images-png: cd assets/generated/ &&  find -name '*.png' -exec optipng '{}' \; && echo 'PNGs are optimized'
scripts.optimize-images-jpg: cd assets/ &&  find . -regextype sed -regex ".*/.*.\(jpg\|JPG\|JPEG\|jpeg\)" -exec jpegoptim '{}' \; && echo 'JPGs are optimized'
scripts.optimize-images-scaledown-jpg: cd assets/ &&  find . -regextype sed -regex ".*/.*.\(jpg\|JPG\|JPEG\|jpeg\)" -exec mogrify -resize 640x640\> '{}' \; && echo 'JPGs are optimized'
scripts.generate:schemas: ts2json-schema -p src/Models/ThemeConfig/Json/ -o Docs/Schemas/ -t tsconfig.json -R . -m ".*ConfigJson" && echo 'tsjson is done' && vite-node scripts/fixSchemas.ts
scripts.housekeeping: git pull && npx update-browserslist-db@latest && npm run weblate:merge-heavy && npm run generate && npm run generate:docs && npm run generate:schemas && npm run generate:contributor-list && vite-node scripts/fetchLanguages.ts && vite-node scripts/generateSunnyUnlabeled.ts && npm run format && git add assets/ langs/ Docs/ **/*.ts Docs/* src/* && git commit -m 'chore: automated housekeeping...'

author: pietervdvn
